name: Space Blitz (bluescratch)
description:
You are a robot sent by humans to space, and your mission is to collect a special type of collectible star. There are creatures trying to stop you because their lives depend on those stars, which provide them with life energy.

Random creatures in space or discover new things. The answer is obvious for human beings, for sure. They're going to save these cute creatures.

That's exactly why they sent you to collect stars and don't give a damn!

So be sincere and follow orders, or your destiny is going to be the same as these creatures.

This is my first 2D Unity project, and it is a platformer speedrun game, so I don't expect much. 

I promise the upcoming projects are going to be better. <3 

New score to beat 115.0128 ^^
